name: Hobo of the Woods
description:
A Hobo lost and hungry in the woods with zero F**** left to give.

An entry for the 2021 Finnish College Game Jam held on November 1 -4 utilizing the theme

 "BREAK THE RULES"

In this 3rd person game, you play as a hungry hobo who discovers that the local forbidden flora can have some really weird effects. 

Can you make it through?

Download the game and find out!

How to play:

Well, we're not the boss of you. You do you.

BUT here are some suggestions that can help you along the way:

WASD to move, press shift to run and space to jump.

Esc (during play): Pause menu.
